name: Storm building above Doctors Point
description:
A storm building above Doctors Point beach, Ōtepoti, Aotearoa 🇳🇿

We timed a coastal wander between passing weather fronts. With the sky darkening we made it back to the shelter of our van just as big raindrops began to fall and thunder boomed overhead. After the downpour passed we ventured out again to enjoy the petrichor and cleaned air.

This work was created by processing one of my photographs from this experience through creative coding tools – specifically vpype flow imager – to produce flow field line art. It was drawn by an AxiDraw SE/A3 plotter using a Pilot Kakuno fountain pen and custom mixed De Atramentis Document ink on Hahnemühle Stella Matt 250gsm fine art paper.

A primary sale of this NFT entitles the owner to request a physical plot for an additional 90tez (including worldwide shipping). Secondary sales can negotiate the transfer of the physical drawing between themselves.

Photographed Dec 30 2021
Processed Dec 31 2021
Plotted Jan 1 2022

NFT: 4000x4000px PNG
Physical plot: 297x297mm drawing on A2 paper
